mapper.sql: a.dbid AS "dbid", a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.leaderId AS "leader.id", a.createby AS "createBy.id", a.createdate AS "createDate", a.updateby AS "updateBy.id", a.updatedate AS "updateDate", a.delFlag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = a.leaderId
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u WHERE u.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mis_dunning_group( id, name, type, leaderId, createby, createdate, updateby, updatedate, delFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{leader.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mis_dunning_group SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, leaderId = #{leader.id}, updateby = #{updateBy.id}, updatedate = #{updateDate}, delFlag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
